
<% @users.each do |user| %>
  <div class="top-item">
  <% if user.pictures.blank?  %>
    <% if user.sex == "female" %>
      <span> <img src="<%= asset_path( 'user_profile_f.png' ) %>" /></span>
    <% else %>
      <span><img src="<%= asset_path( 'user_profile_m.png' ) %>" /></span>
    <% end %>
  <% else %>
    <span>
      <%= link_to (image_tag(user.pictures.last.image)), user%>
    </span>
  <% end %>
  </div>
<% end %> 



visit (

  belongs_to :user
  visitor_id :integer
)
